pont: Prices of several variants overlap with that of the more premium and spacious Baleno
Ride - Stiff set ride not suitable for bad roads
The quality of plastics inside the Swift's cabin feel hard and not premium enough

Safety concerns. The India-spec (unlike the Euro/Japanese spec) scored poorly in the Global NCAP crash tests, receiving just 2 stars even with dual front airbags and ABS. The structure was found to be unstable
